TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IXpsFixedDocumentReader implements class System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IDocumentStructureProvider

Docs.summary: Defines methods for reading the parts of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"> and also for limited types of writing to the document.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example shows how to obtain a reference to an object that implements this interface.
[!code-cs[XpsReadWriteSign#SignatureDefinitionCommandHandler](../../add/codesnippet/CSharp/XpsReadWriteSign/SignatureDialog.xaml.cs#signaturedefinitioncommandhandler)] [!code-vb[XpsReadWriteSign#SignatureDefinitionCommandHandler](../../add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/xpsreadwritesign/signaturedialog.xaml.vb#signaturedefinitioncommandhandler)]
The following example shows how to use an IXpsFixedDocumentReader to obtain an IXpsFixedDocumentReader collection in order to access each page in a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>.
[!code-vb[DocumentStructure#DocStrucFixedDoc](../../add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/documentstructure/window1.xaml.vb#docstrucfixeddoc)] [!code-cs[DocumentStructure#DocStrucFixedDoc](../../add/codesnippet/CSharp/DocumentStructure/Window1.xaml.cs#docstrucfixeddoc)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddSignatureDefinition(class System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition signatureDefinition) cil managed
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void CommitSignatureDefinition() cil managed

Docs.summary: Flushes the package <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream"> and also commits an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition> to the package.
Gets the zero-based position of the document in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence">.
Docs.value: An <see cref="T:System.Int32"> that represents the document location in the sequence.

Docs.summary: Gets the `DocumentStructure` part, if one exists, of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument">.
Docs.value: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsStructure"> that represents the `DocumentStructure` element, if one exists, and its child elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks An [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](../../add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document does not need to have a Document Structure part.

Docs.summary: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"> readers, one reader for each page in the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>.
Docs.value: A collection of fixed page readers, one reader for each page in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument">.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example shows how to use the FixedPages property to obtain an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentReader> collection in order to access the individual pages in a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>.
[!code-vb[DocumentStructure#DocStrucFixedDoc](../../add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/documentstructure/window1.xaml.vb#docstrucfixeddoc)] [!code-cs[DocumentStructure#DocStrucFixedDoc](../../add/codesnippet/CSharp/DocumentStructure/Window1.xaml.cs#docstrucfixeddoc)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageReader GetFixedPage(class System.Uri pageSource) cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets a reader for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"> with the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](../../add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket">, if one exists, that is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket"> that contains the default printing options for the document; or `null` if no print ticket exists for the document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](../../add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document, see chapter 2 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](../../add/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RemoveSignatureDefinition(class System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition signatureDefinition) cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets a collection of all the signature definitions that are associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument">.
Docs.value: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> of signature definitions, typically one for every person who signed or will sign the document.

Docs.summary: Gets the thumbnail image, if a thumbnail exists, that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument">.

Docs.value: A <xref:System.Uri> that represents the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](../../add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] for the document.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example shows how to use the Uri property.
[!code-vb[XpsReadWriteSign#IterateXpsPackageParts](../../add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/xpsreadwritesign/readingandwritingxps.vb#iteratexpspackageparts)] [!code-cs[XpsReadWriteSign#IterateXpsPackageParts](../../add/codesnippet/CSharp/XpsReadWriteSign/ReadingAndWritingXps.cs#iteratexpspackageparts)]
